entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm near Lake Huron. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
